name: CALENDULA
summary: How to play a game that doesn't want to be played? Calendula is an experimental meta game about trying to play a game. Use your logic to thrive against conventions and get surrounded by a dark atmosphere.
info:
• 中文名: 金盏花
  • 别名: 金盏菊
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏引擎: Unity
  • 发行日期: 2016-2-2
  • 官方网站: http://calendulagame.com/
